reviews.author: Eva Rickett
reviews.text: The teaching and pastoral care has been outstanding, as well as the welcome and love we have received. The prayer evenings and Women fellowship is something I look forward to every week. A church alive with God and his vision.

reviews.author: Gwen Nyeko
reviews.text: This is our home church. My daughter gets fed spiritually and she has grown in the Lord as she has been attending there. Their youth is active and keeps children drawn to Christ.

reviews.author: Community Member
reviews.text: Lovely atmosphere. Very friendly and welcoming. Members of this church make a Christian difference in the community and catch people who have fallen through the holes in our social safety nets.
